description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the remote code execution vulnerability in Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) identified by CVE-2024-49023, it is essential to apply the latest update as provided:

1. Download the update package for Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) from the official Microsoft Update Catalog using the following link: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB49023.
2. Install the update, following any prompts that may appear during the installation process.
3. Restart your browser to ensure all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses the use after free vulnerability, which could potentially allow attackers to execute arbitrary code remotely if exploited.
- For full implementation, ensure the environment is using Microsoft Edge version 130.0.2849.46 or later.
- Always backup critical data before applying system updates to avoid any data loss if issues arise.
